name: div
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
Three-Piece Design : Combines neoprene, TPE, & a Monoflex carbon fiber plate for elite performance without sacrificing safety or comfort
Elite Protection : Semi-rigid, articulating back-of-hand design protects while preventing hyperextension of the fingers
TPE Lattice Structure : Engineered to dissipate energy by collapsing upon impact, reducing force & enhancing safety
Reversible Setup : Interchangeable design fits both right-handed & left-handed batters
Sizing : Large – one size fits most for a secure & versatile fit
